rooms.name: Entrance Hall

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Spacious living area featuring bold geometric patterns, streamlined furniture, and built-in seating areas. Includes accessibility-friendly design elements.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: A dedicated dining space with Art Deco detailing in the fixtures and accessible counter height for ease of use.

rooms.name: Family Room
rooms.description: Multi-functional room serving as a guest lounge and communal area with open plan layout to accommodate joint family gatherings. Includes wheelchair ramps and clearances.

rooms.name: Master Suite
rooms.description: Opulent master bedroom featuring Art Deco style decor, ample space for accessibility modifications, an en-suite bathroom designed with universal design principles, and a private balcony with Vastu considerations.

rooms.name: Guest Suite
rooms.description: Guest bedroom with accessible fixtures, streamlined Art Deco aesthetics, and integrated storage space.

rooms.name: Study/Office
rooms.description: A quiet workspace that combines modern ergonomic design with classic Art Deco detailing. Fully accessible and compliant with local building norms.
